name: Applicant Qualification & Ranking AI Worker
description: Screens all incoming applicants against job requirements, scores and ranks candidates, and updates your ATS with qualification status.

integrations.name: All major ATS platforms (Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, iCIMS, etc.)

overview: Screens all incoming applicants against job requirements and ranks by fit This AI Worker ensures no qualified candidate slips through the cracksâ€”and no unqualified candidate wastes recruiter time. For every new applicant, it parses their resume, extracts key qualifications, matches them against job requirements, detects red flags, and applies a weighted scoring algorithm. Candidates are categorized as Strong Match, Potential Fit, Weak Match, or Unclear, with all results automatically updated in your ATS. Recruiters start each day with a prioritized queue instead of an overwhelming inbox.

connectors.name: All major ATS platforms (Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, iCIMS, etc.)
